tip.stardewhud.effects: Control vanilla Minecraft status effects display
tooltip.stardewhud.enabled: Enable or disable the entire HUD
tooltip.stardewhud.counterItemId: Item ID to count in inventory (e.g. minecraft:diamond)
tooltip.stardewhud.backgroundAlpha: Transparency of the background (0.0 = fully transparent, 1.0 = fully opaque)
tooltip.stardewhud.positionX: Distance from right edge of screen (0 = auto position)
tooltip.stardewhud.positionY: Distance from top edge of screen (0 = auto position)
tooltip.stardewhud.scalePercent: Size of the HUD in percentage (10% to 500%)
tooltip.stardewhud.showClock: Show or hide the clock component
tooltip.stardewhud.showTimeDisplay: Show or hide the time and date display
tooltip.stardewhud.showWeather: Show or hide the weather icon
tooltip.stardewhud.showFortune: Show or hide the fortune icon
tooltip.stardewhud.showItemCounter: Show or hide the item counter
tooltip.stardewhud.hideVanillaEffects: Hide vanilla status effects when they overlap with the HUD
